definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

sentences.english: Outside the city centre, the largest suburban shopping areas are Gosforth and Byker.
sentences.chinese: 市中心外，格斯福斯和拜克是郊区最大的购物区。

sentences.english: The bins will be installed in central London and Liverpool in October.
sentences.chinese: 十月份，这种垃圾桶将被安装在伦敦市中心和利物浦。

sentences.english: In some of the inner-city streets we have people trapped in buildings.
sentences.chinese: 还有市民被困在市中心的建筑物中。

sentences.english: There will be floating hotels in the center of the capital along Moskva river embankments next year.
sentences.chinese: 明年在莫斯科市中心的莫斯科河上将出现浮动酒店。

sentences.english: Down town Naperville gives you a feel of a charming small town; yet with a big city dynamics. There are many restaurants;
sentences.chinese: 瑞珀市中心是一个迷人的小镇，但也有大城市的活力。

sentences.english: In the center of town is a pair of 20-foot-long sheet metal shidas.
sentences.chinese: 垨市中心有一双20英尺长的金属凉鞋雕塑。

sentences.english: Skywalk in Bangkok, Thailand, which connects three express stations in downtown.
sentences.chinese: 曼谷空中走廊，于市中心连结三个捷运站。

sentences.english: Nowadays an apartment in the center of the city costs an arm and a leg!
sentences.chinese: 现今，位于市中心的一套公寓房要的是天价。

sentences.english: The Cotton Tree is a historic symbol of Freetown, the capital city of Sierra Leone.
sentences.chinese: 木棉是塞拉利昂市中心弗里敦历史的标志。

sentences.english: Excellent value for money, just outside the centre of Brisbane.
sentences.chinese: 价格物超所值，且布理斯班市中心就在附近。

sentences.english: Are you going to drive downtown this weekend?
sentences.chinese: 这周你开车去市中心吗？

sentences.english: A system of roads radiates from the town centre.
sentences.chinese: 一组道路从市中心向四面八方伸展出去。

sentences.english: The town centre was chocked up with traffic.
sentences.chinese: 市中心被车辆挤得水泄不通。

sentences.english: It’s very central. And it’s convenient for the shops on Wangfujing Street.
sentences.chinese: 它在市中心，从那里到王府井大街上的商店非常方便。

sentences.english: Businessmen take a walk in Tokyo's downtown financial districts of Otemachi and Marunouchi.
sentences.chinese: 商人们走在东京市中心金融区大手町和丸之内。

sentences.english: The sculpture of a group of heroes in the centre of the city square shows a master hand.
sentences.chinese: 市中心广场的英雄群像的雕塑显示了高超的艺术。

definition: Laocheng district of Luoyang City 洛陽市|洛阳市[Luo4 yang2 shi4], Henan
travel time/expected time for a car journey
